name: TXP_CAS_HX
description: This table contains information about a waitlisted transplant patient's lung CAS subscore over time, and the dates on which those scores were recorded.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CAS
columns.description: The patient's lung composite allocation subscore for this transplant episode.

columns.name: CAS_DATE
columns.description: The date the corresponding lung composite allocation subscore was entered into UNOS.
